00030     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00031     Occlusion::Occlusion(unsigned  int visibilityThsd):                
00032                 mVisibilityTreshold(visibilityThsd),
00033                                 mIsQueryPoolNotInitiated(true),
00034                                 mFrameConservativeVisibility (300)
00035     {
00036     };
00037     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     bool Occlusion::nextFrame(PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera *cam,  
00039                                 MovableObjectList *camInProgressVisibles,
00040                                 bool onlyshadowcaster,
00041                                 RenderQueue *q)
00042     {
00043         bool newframe = true;
00044 
00045         mCurrentRenderQueue = q; 
00046         mOnlyShadowCaster = onlyshadowcaster;
00047 
00048         if (cam != mCurrentCam)
00049         {
00050             mCurrentCam = cam;
00051         }
00052         if  (mCurrentCam->nextFrame(Root::getSingleton().getCurrentFrameNumber ()))
00053         {              
00054             // change frame Id counter 
00055             //that identify current frame.
00056             mFrameId = mCurrentCam->getFrameId();
00057             newframe = true;     
00058         }
00059 
00060         if (newframe)
00061         {
00062             camInProgressVisibles->clear();
00063             #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00064                 // reset counters.
00065                     triangle_cnt = 0;
00066                     traversed_nodes_cnt = 0;
00067                     frustum_culled_nodes_cnt = 0;
00068                     query_cnt = 0;
00069                 object_cnt = 0;
00070             #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00071             return true;
00072         }
00073         return false;
00074     }
00075     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00076     void Occlusion::queueDraw(PagingLandScapeOctreeNode& n) 
00077     { 
00078         #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00079             object_cnt++; 
00080         #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG  
00081 
00082         VisibilityData * const vis =  n.getNodeData (mCurrentCam); 
00083         if (!vis->notified)
00084         {   
00085             // notify objects handled by this node
00086             n.notifyNodeObjects (mCurrentCam, mOnlyShadowCaster);
00087         }       
00088         // as it's visible add its attached objects to render queue.
00089         // note that we know it already has been notified by camera,
00090         // when we issued query.        
00091         n._addAlreadyNotifiedToVisibles ();
00092         
00093         // now it had been drawn, notified should be false.
00094         vis->notified = false;
00095         vis->frameID = mFrameId;
00096     }
00097     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00098     bool Occlusion::issueDrawQuery(PagingLandScapeOctreeNode& n) 
00099     {
00100         VisibilityData * const vis =  n.getNodeData (mCurrentCam);
00101 
00102                 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00103                 query_cnt++;
00104                     traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00105             assert (vis->viewFrustumVisible);
00106         #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00107 
00108         assert (vis->frameID != mFrameId) ;
00109         assert (vis->query == 0);
00110         assert (n.isOccluder());
00111 
00112         MovableObjectList *moToRender = n.getVisibleNotifiedNodeObjects(mCurrentCam, mOnlyShadowCaster);
00113     
00114         // Mark that Node already notified by this frame/cam combination
00115         vis->frameID = mFrameId;
00116         vis->notified = true;
00117 
00118         if (!moToRender->empty())
00119         {
00120             HardwareOcclusionQuery *query =  mQueryPool.getPoolable();
00121             vis->query = query;
00122 
00123             // create the render Queue.
00124             MovableObjectList::iterator it = moToRender->begin(), itend = moToRender->end();
00125             while (it != itend)
00126             {
00127                                 (*it)->_updateRenderQueue(&*mCurrentRenderQueue);
00128                 ++it;
00129             }
00130 
00131             // draw and query.
00132             query->beginOcclusionQuery ();
00133                                 mScnMngr->directRenderSingleQueue (&*mCurrentRenderQueue);
00134                 query->endOcclusionQuery ();
00135 
00136             moToRender->clear();
00137 
00138             return true;
00139         }
00140         return false;
00141     }
00142     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00143     void Occlusion::issueBboxQuery(OcclusionElement& n) 
00144     {
00145         #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00146                 query_cnt++;
00147             #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00148 
00149         VisibilityData * const vis =  n.getNodeData (mCurrentCam);
00150         assert (vis->query == 0);
00151         HardwareOcclusionQuery *query =  mQueryPool.getPoolable();
00152         vis->query = query;
00153 
00154         query->beginOcclusionQuery();  
00155                 // render bounding box for object 
00156             mScnMngr->directRenderSingleObject(n.getOcclusionBoundingBox());
00157             query->endOcclusionQuery();
00158 
00159         //mScnMngr->addVisible (n.getOcclusionBoundingBox());
00160     }
00161     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00162     bool Occlusion::isQueryResultIsVisible(OcclusionElement& node) 
00163     {
00164              // check visibility result
00165         unsigned int visiblePixels = 0;
00166                 //this one wait if result not available
00167         VisibilityData * const vis =  node.getNodeData (mCurrentCam);
00168         vis->query->pullOcclusionQuery (&visiblePixels);
00169 
00170         mQueryPool.removePoolable (vis->query);
00171         vis->query = 0;
00172 
00173                 if (visiblePixels > mVisibilityTreshold) 
00174         {
00175             return true;
00176         }
00177         return false;
00178     }
00179     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00180     void Occlusion::pullUpVisibility(OcclusionElement& node) 
00181     {
00182             OcclusionElement* n = &node;
00183         VisibilityData *vis =  n->getNodeData (mCurrentCam);
00184 
00185             while (!vis->queryVisible) 
00186         {
00187                     vis->queryVisible = true;
00188                     n = n->getParent(); 
00189             if (0 == n)
00190                 return;
00191             vis = n->getNodeData (mCurrentCam);
00192             }
00193     }
00194     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00195     bool Occlusion::insideViewFrustum(OcclusionElement& n) 
00196     { 
00197         const bool result =  mCurrentCam->isVisible (n.getCullBoundingBox ());
00198             
00199             #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00200             if (result) 
00201             {
00202                 n.getNodeData (mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = true;
00203                 }
00204             else
00205             {
00206                 n.getNodeData (mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = false;
00207                         frustum_culled_nodes_cnt++;
00208             }
00209         #endif
00210 
00211             return result;
00212     } 
00213     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00214     //this is the algorithm from the paper
00215     void Occlusion::CHCtraversal(PagingLandScapeOctree *octree)
00216     {
00217         if (mIsQueryPoolNotInitiated)
00218             initQueryPool ();
00219 
00220                 const unsigned int visibilityTreshold = mVisibilityTreshold;
00221         const Vector3 &camPos = mCurrentCam->getPosition();
00222             FrontToBackNodeSorterPriorityQueue traversalStack = FrontToBackNodeSorterPriorityQueue(FrontToBackNodeSorterOperator (camPos));
00223 
00224         //draw leaves, stack otherwise   
00225         CHCTraversal toStackTraversal(traversalStack, *this);       
00226         const unsigned int frameId = mFrameId;
00227         const unsigned int lastframeId = mFrameId - 1;
00228 
00229         // first Octree 
00230         traversalStack.push (octree);
00231             while (!traversalStack.empty() || !m_queryQueue.empty()) 
00232         {
00233                     //first part
00234             // get previous frame occlusion results
00235                     while (traversalStack.empty() &&
00236                 !m_queryQueue.empty() && 
00237                 !m_queryQueue.front()->getNodeData (mCurrentCam)->query->isStillOutstanding()) 
00238             {
00239                             OcclusionElement& node = *(m_queryQueue.front());
00240                             m_queryQueue.pop();
00241 
00242                 VisibilityData * const vis =  node.getNodeData (mCurrentCam);
00243                 // should be already frustum culled and flagged as not visible
00244                 assert (vis->lastQueryFrameId == frameId);
00245                 assert (!vis->queryVisible);
00246                 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG   
00247                     assert (vis->viewFrustumVisible);
00248                 #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00249 
00250                 // check visibility result
00251                 unsigned int visiblePixels = 0;
00252                             //this one wait if result not available
00253                 vis->query->pullOcclusionQuery(&visiblePixels);
00254                 mQueryPool.removePoolable(vis->query);
00255                 vis->query = 0;
00256                             if(visiblePixels > visibilityTreshold) 
00257                 {
00258                                     pullUpVisibility (node);
00259                     
00260                                     // Traverse for sure this visible node
00261                     // And therefore check children
00262                                         node.traversal (toStackTraversal);      
00263                 }
00264                     }
00265                     //2nd part
00266             // query visible objects
00267             while (!traversalStack.empty()) 
00268             {
00269                             OcclusionElement& node = *traversalStack.top ();
00270                             traversalStack.pop ();
00271 
00272                 // make sure there's no loop of some sort.
00273                 // as we must query a node only once 
00274                 assert (frameId != node.getNodeData (mCurrentCam)->lastQueryFrameId);
00275                 if (insideViewFrustum (node)) 
00276                 {
00277                     VisibilityData * const vis =  node.getNodeData (mCurrentCam);
00278                                     // identify  visible in the last frame nodes
00279                     const bool wasVisible = vis->queryVisible && 
00280                                             lastframeId == vis->lastQueryFrameId;
00281                     if (node.isLeaf())
00282                     {
00283                         if (wasVisible && node.isOccluder())
00284                         {                       
00285                                             // Draw & query at the same time previously visible nodes
00286                             if (issueDrawQuery (static_cast <PagingLandScapeOctreeNode &> (node)))
00287                             {
00288                                 m_queryQueue.push (&node);
00289                             }
00290                             else
00291                             {
00292                                 // skip testing previously visible node
00293                                 // that is not visible when notified.
00294                                 // make next frame get here again, 
00295                                 // saving a box query
00296                                 vis->queryVisible = true;
00297                                                 vis->lastQueryFrameId = frameId;
00298                                 continue;
00299                             }
00300                         }
00301                         else
00302                         {
00303                             issueBboxQuery (node);
00304                             m_queryQueue.push (&node);
00305                         }
00306                     }
00307                     else
00308                     {
00309                         if (wasVisible)
00310                         {
00311                             // skip testing previously visible node 
00312                             // (interior nodes in hierarchy)
00313                                                 node.traversal (toStackTraversal);
00314                                         }
00315                         else
00316                         {
00317                                             // only query node that wasn't visible last frame
00318                             issueBboxQuery (node);                    
00319                                         m_queryQueue.push (&node);
00320                                         }
00321                     }
00322 
00323                                     // reset this node's visibility to false
00324                     // Will be updated by results queries that will pull up results.
00325                     // by children that will be flagged visible and will transmit info 
00326                     // to their parent nodes (pullUpVisibility())
00327                                     vis->queryVisible = false;
00328                                     // update node's visited flag to make sure we won't visit 2 times
00329                     // and to "tick" the visible info.
00330                                     vis->lastQueryFrameId = frameId;
00331                             }
00332                     }
00333             }
00334     }
00335     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00336     //this is the algorithm from the paper, conservative way.
00337     void Occlusion::CHCtraversalConservative(PagingLandScapeOctree *octree)
00338     {
00339 
00340                 const unsigned int frameConservativeVisibility = mFrameConservativeVisibility;
00341                 const unsigned int visibilityTreshold = mVisibilityTreshold;
00342 
00343         if (mIsQueryPoolNotInitiated)
00344             initQueryPool ();
00345 
00346         const Vector3 &camPos = mCurrentCam->getPosition();
00347             FrontToBackNodeSorterPriorityQueue traversalStack = FrontToBackNodeSorterPriorityQueue(FrontToBackNodeSorterOperator (camPos));
00348 
00349         //draw leaves, stack otherwise   
00350         CHCTraversal toStackTraversal(traversalStack, *this);       
00351         const unsigned int frameId = mFrameId;
00352         const unsigned int lastframeId = mFrameId - 1;
00353 
00354         // first Octree 
00355         traversalStack.push (octree);
00356             while (!traversalStack.empty() || !m_queryQueue.empty()) 
00357         {
00358                     //first part
00359             // get previous frame occlusion results
00360                     while (traversalStack.empty() &&
00361                 !m_queryQueue.empty() && 
00362                 !m_queryQueue.front()->getNodeData (mCurrentCam)->query->isStillOutstanding()) 
00363             {
00364                             OcclusionElement& node = *(m_queryQueue.front());
00365                             m_queryQueue.pop();
00366 
00367                 VisibilityData * const vis =  node.getNodeData (mCurrentCam);
00368                 // should be already frustum culled and flagged as not visible
00369                 assert (vis->lastQueryFrameId == frameId);
00370                 assert (!vis->queryVisible);
00371                 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG   
00372                     assert (vis->viewFrustumVisible);
00373                 #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00374 
00375                 // check visibility result
00376                 unsigned int visiblePixels = 0;
00377                             //this one wait if result not available
00378                 vis->query->pullOcclusionQuery(&visiblePixels);
00379                 mQueryPool.removePoolable(vis->query);
00380                 vis->query = 0;
00381                             if(visiblePixels > visibilityTreshold) 
00382                 {
00383                                     pullUpVisibility (node);
00384                     
00385                                     // Traverse for sure this visible node
00386                     // And therefore check children
00387                                         node.traversal (toStackTraversal);      
00388                 }
00389                     }
00390                     //2nd part
00391             // query visible objects
00392             while (!traversalStack.empty()) 
00393             {
00394                             OcclusionElement& node = *traversalStack.top ();
00395                             traversalStack.pop ();
00396 
00397                 // make sure there's no loop of some sort.
00398                 // as we must query a node only once 
00399                 assert (frameId != node.getNodeData (mCurrentCam)->lastQueryFrameId);
00400                 if (insideViewFrustum (node)) 
00401                 {
00402                     VisibilityData * const vis =  node.getNodeData (mCurrentCam);
00403 
00404                                     // identify  visible in the last frame nodes
00405                     const bool wasVisible = vis->queryVisible;
00406                     const bool wasVisibleandQueriedBeforeLastNFrame = wasVisible 
00407                                                                     && lastframeId - frameConservativeVisibility < vis->lastQueryFrameId;
00408                     if (wasVisibleandQueriedBeforeLastNFrame)
00409                     {
00410                         if (node.isLeaf() && node.isOccluder())
00411                         { 
00412                             MovableObjectList *moToRender = static_cast <PagingLandScapeOctreeNode *> (&node)->getVisibleNotifiedNodeObjects(mCurrentCam, mOnlyShadowCaster);
00413                             // create the render Queue.
00414                             if (!moToRender->empty())
00415                             {
00416                                 MovableObjectList::iterator it = moToRender->begin(), 
00417                                                             itend = moToRender->end();
00418                                 while (it != itend)
00419                                 {
00420                                     (*it)->_updateRenderQueue (&*mCurrentRenderQueue);
00421                                     ++it;
00422                                 }
00423                                 mScnMngr->directRenderSingleQueue (&*mCurrentRenderQueue);
00424                             }
00425                             vis->notified = true;
00426                         }
00427                                         pullUpVisibility (node);
00428                         node.traversal (toStackTraversal);
00429                     }
00430                     else
00431                     {
00432                         const bool wasVisibleandQueriedExacltyLastNFrame = wasVisible && 
00433                                                                            lastframeId - frameConservativeVisibility == vis->lastQueryFrameId;
00434                         if (node.isLeaf())
00435                         {
00436                             if (wasVisibleandQueriedExacltyLastNFrame && node.isOccluder())
00437                             {                       
00438                                                 // Draw & query at the same time previously visible nodes
00439                                 if (issueDrawQuery (static_cast <PagingLandScapeOctreeNode &> (node)))
00440                                 {
00441                                     m_queryQueue.push (&node);
00442                                 }
00443                                 else
00444                                 {
00445                                     // skip testing previously visible node
00446                                     // that is not visible when notified.
00447                                     // make next frame get here again, 
00448                                     // saving a box query
00449                                     vis->queryVisible = true;
00450                                                     vis->lastQueryFrameId = frameId;
00451                                     continue;
00452                                 }
00453                             }
00454                             else
00455                             {
00456                                 issueBboxQuery (node);
00457                                 m_queryQueue.push (&node);
00458                             }
00459                         }
00460                         else
00461                         {
00462                             if (wasVisibleandQueriedExacltyLastNFrame)
00463                             {
00464                                 // skip testing previously visible node 
00465                                 // (interior nodes in hierarchy)
00466                                                     node.traversal (toStackTraversal);
00467                                             }
00468                             else
00469                             {
00470                                                 // only query node that wasn't visible last frame
00471                                 issueBboxQuery (node);                    
00472                                             m_queryQueue.push (&node);
00473                                             }
00474                         }
00475                                         // reset this node's visibility to false
00476                         // Will be updated by results queries that will pull up results.
00477                         // by children that will be flagged visible and will transmit info 
00478                         // to their parent nodes (pullUpVisibility())
00479                                         vis->queryVisible = false;
00480                                         // update node's visited flag to make sure we won't visit 2 times
00481                         // and to "tick" the visible info.
00482                                         vis->lastQueryFrameId = frameId;
00483                     }
00484                             }
00485                     }
00486             }
00487     }
